name: WineGuru
0:
”Alexa open Wine Guru”
”Alexa start Wine Guru”
”Alexa ask Wine Guru what goes with chicken”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wine guru
des: Red Wine Selector asks you a series of question to pick the best red wine for your need. It helps you select the perfect wine to pair with your meal or for leisure drinking.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
